meanings.definition: The action or process of intussuscepting or being intussuscepted.
meanings.sent1: The intussusception of the telescope's parts allowed it to be easily stored.
meanings.sent2: The intussusception of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to complete.
meanings.sent3: The intussusception of the socks in the drawer caused a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts experienced an intussusception, merging into a creative idea.
meanings.sent5: The intussusception of colors in the painting created a beautiful blend.

meanings.definition: The slipping of one part within another, as of the intestine.
meanings.sent1: The intussusception of the mat inside the frame made it look thicker.
meanings.sent2: The intussusception of the fabric layers gave the dress a unique texture.
meanings.sent3: The intussusception of flavors in the dish surprised the taste buds.
meanings.sent4: His words had an intussusception, conveying hidden meanings.
meanings.sent5: The intussusception of branches in the tree created a natural shelter.
